sentence: Trending News The January 6 trial that will set the standard for hundreds to follow Pence says "Trump is wrong" that he could have overturned election Lawmaker wants Yellowstone's "zone of death" loophole fixed What's behind the push for a fourth stimulus check RNC approves measure to censure Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger Aaron Navarro Aaron Navarro is an associate producer for the political unit at CBS News, focusing on House and gubernatorial campaigns as well as the census and redistricting.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: North Carolina Supreme Court orders redrawing of congressional map
